<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Well-armed](/Feats.aspx?ID=3537) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Skeleton" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=236" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 56</row>

</column>

---

Your detachable limbs offer flexibility. You Interact to remove your arm and wield it in the other one, increasing your [reach](/Traits.aspx?ID=192) by 5 feet for any one-handed weapon held in that arm. If your next action is a Strike with that weapon, creatures that were outside your reach that you can now hit are [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) against your first attack. You don't have a free hand while holding the arm. You can Interact to reattach the arm while holding it.
name: Well-armed
